name: Inexto
goal:
• INEXTO’s mission is to offer cutting edge serialization, authentication and track & trace solutions to support clients in securing their supply chain, for more transparency, safety and ethics in trade flows
• INEXTO provides, in response to regulatory requirements, industrial, cost effective solutions compliant to Open Standards
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Tracking and Tracing of exciseable products
Tracking and Tracing of non-exciseable products in order to protect consumers from the threats consequences of the illicit trade and counterfeit products, Falsfied médecines directive
